values.name: Set Single Value in Range
values.description: Set the value of all cells in the range A1:C3 to 7

values.name: Set Multiple Values in Range
values.description: Set the values in the range A1:C3 to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9

values.name: Get Values in Range
values.description: Retrieve the values in the range A1:C3

values.name: Set Single Formula in Range
values.description: Set the formula in all cells in the range A1:C3 to '=RAND()*17'

values.name: Set Multiple Formulas in Range
values.description: Set the formulas in the range A1:B2 to an array of different formulas

values.name: Get Formulas in Range
values.description: Retrieve the formulas in the range A1:C3

values.name: Clear Range Content
values.description: Clear content from the range A1:C1

values.name: Insert Range
values.description: Insert a 3x3 range at A1, shifting cells to the right

values.name: Select a Named Range
values.description: Select the range named myData

values.name: Get Worksheet from Selected Range
values.description: Output the name of the worksheet for the selected range

values.name: Create a Table
values.description: Create a table from the data in range A1:E7

values.name: Enumerate Table Rows
values.description: Output the values in every row in the table at index 0

values.name: Add Table Row
values.description: Add a new row with values [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] to a table called 'MyTable' at index 3

values.name: Get Charts in Worksheet
values.description: Retrieve the list of charts in the current worksheet

values.name: Add Chart Data
values.description: Add a sample chart data on worksheet Sheet1

values.name: Create Chart
values.description: Add a chart on worksheet Sheet1 with source data from Range A1:D5 and series is set to be auto

values.name: Rename Chart
values.description: Rename Chart1 to NewChartName

values.name: Create Worksheet
values.description: Create a new worksheet with a random name

values.name: Format Table Row
values.description: Set the background color of the 4th row of 'MyTable' to green

values.name: Delete Table Row
values.description: Delete the 4th row from 'MyTable' and shifts cells up

values.name: Set Number Format in Range
values.description: Set the number format for cell A1 in the active sheet

values.name: Get Worksheets in Workbook
values.description: Output the names of all of the worksheets in the current workbook

values.name: Read Calculation Mode
values.description: Read the calculation mode for the current workbook

values.name: Set Chart Title
values.description: Add 'New Title' as the title of Chart1

values.name: Add Axis Title
values.description: Add Values as the title for the value Axis

values.name: Show Data Labels Series Name
values.description: Make Series Name shown in Datalabels

values.name: Get Chart By Name
values.description: Get the Chart named Chart1

values.name: Get Chart Title
values.description: Get the text of Chart Title from Chart1

values.name: Change Chart Background Color
values.description: Change the background color of Chart1 to red.

values.name: Change Series Fill Color
values.description: Change the fill color of Series1 to be red

values.name: Configure Axis
values.description: Configure value Axis, set maximum to be 5, minimum to be 0, major unit to be 1 and minor unit to be 0.2

values.name: Format Chart Title
values.description: Make the title of Chart1 to be bold and red

values.name: Create and Format Chart
values.description: Write data to a range, create a pie chart, and format it

values.name: Resize Chart
values.description: Make Chart1 200 pixels in weight and height

values.name: Set Chart Position
values.description: Move the Chart to 200 pixels from the top and 200 pixels from the left end.

values.name: Set SeriesBy
values.description: Set Seriesby, Changing from Columns to Rows is same as switch Columns/Rows

values.name: Show Legend
values.description: Show Legend of Chart1

values.name: Show MajorGridlines
values.description: Show Major Gridlines on ValueAxis of Chart1

values.name: Get Selected Range
values.description: Get the address of the workbook's currently selected range

values.name: Set Chart Data Source
values.description: Set SourceData of Chart1

values.name: Calculate Workbooks
values.description: Calculate the current workbook using the 'full' method'

values.name: Format Table Rows Based On Values
values.description: Format rows of 'Table1' with 2nd cell greater than 2 in green, other rows in red.

values.name: Format Table Row Based On Largest Value
values.description: Format row of a table based on a specific column's largest value

values.name: Clear Table Row Formatting
values.description: Clear formatting for all data rows in a table

values.name: Get Tables in Workbook
values.description: Retrieve the list of tables in the current workbook

values.name: Hide Axis Title
values.description: Hide the Title of Value Axis

values.name: Delete Chart
values.description: Delete Chart Named Chart1

values.name: Hide Chart Title
values.description: Hide the title of Chart1

values.name: Get Active Worksheet
values.description: Get the name of the workbook's active worksheet

values.name: Monitor Data Change Event on a Table
values.description: Create a table binding to monitor data changes in the table. When data is changed, the background color of the table will be changed to orange.

values.name: Keep Reference to a Range
values.description: Keep reference to a Range

values.name: Delete Active Worksheet
values.description: Delete the active worksheet from the workbook

suggestions.name: Apply a Filter to a Table
Apply a Filter to a Range
